statements: SELECT * FROM email_marketing_campaign WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, send_date, preference_1 FROM email_marketing_campaign;
SELECT campaign_id, customer_id, campaign_name, send_date FROM email_marketing_campaign WHERE preference_1 = 'special';
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_campaign WHERE send_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(campaign_id) AS total_campaigns FROM email_marketing_campaign GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, send_date FROM email_marketing_campaign WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_campaign WHERE preference_1 = 'value1' AND preference_2 = 'value2';
SELECT customer_id, campaign_name FROM email_marketing_campaign WHERE send_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM email_marketing_campaign ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_campaign WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM email_campaigns WHERE schedule > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_description FROM email_campaigns WHERE target_audience ->> 'age' = '18-25';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 10 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_description FROM email_campaigns WHERE schedule >= '2022-10-15' ORDER BY schedule ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, preferences->>'language' AS preferred_language FROM customers WHERE preferences->>'theme' = 'dark';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers c JOIN email_campaigns e ON c.customer_id = e.campaign_id WHERE c.customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE preference = 'VIP';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, campaign_name, response_action FROM customers INNER JOIN campaign_responses ON customers.customer_id = campaign_responses.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE preference = 'VIP';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT c.customer_name, m.campaign_name, cr.response_date FROM customers c INNER JOIN campaign_responses cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id INNER JOIN marketing_campaigns m ON cr.campaign_id = m.campaign_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, cr.response_date, cr.response_action FROM customers c LEFT JOIN campaign_responses cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id WHERE cr.response_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY cr.response_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email_address, preferences FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC, category ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, preferences FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3 AND email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM email_templates ORDER BY template_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT response_id, response_date, response_status FROM campaign_responses WHERE response_date <= NOW();
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM email_templates WHERE template_id < 5 ORDER BY template_id DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, e.template_name, ec.campaign_name FROM customers c INNER JOIN campaign_subscribers cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id INNER JOIN email_campaigns ec ON cs.campaign_id = ec.campaign_id INNER JOIN email_templates e ON ec.campaign_id = e.template_id WHERE ec.start_date > '2022-01-01';
